title: [Fan Death Battle] Ryze VS Quan Chi (Mortal Kombat)

embed.description: Quan Chi is a character in the Mortal Kombat series. He made his debut in the animated series, Mortal Kombat: Defenders of the Realm while his first video game appearance was in Mortal Kombat Mythologies: Sub-Zero, and he first became playable in Mortal Kombat 4. He is a frequently appearing, major villain in the series.

body:
Two bald sorcerers go head to head, but only one will come out alive. Which one would win?

See above for Quan Chi info.
